name: Breville BOV900BSS Smart Oven Air Fryer Pro and Convection Oven, Brushed Stainless Steel
short_description: The Breville Smart Oven Air Fryer Pro with Element iQ System is a versatile countertop oven allowing you to roast, air fry and dehydrate; Super convection reduces cooking time by up to 30%; Choose from 13 cooking functions; Includes interior oven light ELEMENT iQ SYSTEM: With 5 independent quartz elements, smart algorithms steer oven's power where and when it's needed to create a tailored cooking environment; Sensing and digital PID temperature control eliminate cold spots for precise cooking AIR FRY AND DEHYDRATE SETTINGS: Air fry family favorites like French fries; Higher temperatures combine with super convection (maximized air flow) for crispy golden, air-fried foods; Oven also dehydrates up to 4 trays at once of a wide range of foods SUPER CONVECTION TECHNOLOGY: Electric air fryer's 2 speed convection fan (super & regular) offers more cooking control; Super convection provides greater volume of hot air to ensure fast and even heat distribution for air frying, dehydration and roasting 13 COOKING FUNCTIONS: Versatile countertop oven and air fryer with 13 functions for your kitchen; Toast, Bagel, Broil, Bake, Roast, Warm, Pizza, Proof, Air Fry, Reheat, Cookies, Slow Cook, and Dehydrate; Like having a toaster, pizza oven and more in one EXTRA LARGE CAPACITY: 21.5 x 17.1 x 12.7 inch interior with capacity for 9 slices of bread, a 14 pound turkey, air fried French fries, and slow cooking with a 5 qt Dutch oven; Large countertop oven fits most 9 x 13 inch pans and 12 cup muffin trays INTERIOR OVEN LIGHT: Integrated oven light automatically turns on at the end of the cooking cycle to help you see inside your smart oven air fryer; Turn on at any time to view progress; Oven features replaceable componentry like a traditional large oven
product_description: Breville BOV900BSS Smart Oven Air Fryer Pro and Convection Oven, Brushed Stainless Steel

name: Chefman Air Fryer – 6 QT Compact Airfryer for Quick & Easy Meals in Minutes, Features Hi-Fry Technology for Extra Crisp, Touchscreen Controls with 4 Presets, Nonstick & Dishwasher Safe Basket - Black
short_description: FAST AND EASY: This compact air fryer handles any culinary challenge. Customize cooking time and temperature with the digital touch screen display or use one of four preset functions for quick, one-touch meals. Perfect for serving 3-5 people 450°F HI-FRY TECHNOLOGY: Achieve the perfect finishing crunch on your air-fried favorites. Increase the heat to 450°F during the final two minutes of cooking: perfect for extra crispy chicken tenders and French fries. STYLISH AND COMPACT: The sleek, narrow design of this air fryers maximizes its 6-quart capacity while minimizing its countertop footprint. Its compact size makes it a great space saver, fitting perfectly on your counter or in your cabinets HEALTHY COOKING: Enjoy delicious meals with little-to-no oil. This Chefman large air fryer lets you cook healthier, low-fat meals that still taste amazing LED SHAKE NOTIFICATIONS: Get notified with an audible alarm halfway through cooking, reminding you to shake your food for the crispiest results possible SIMPLE CLEAN-UP: The 6-quart nonstick basket and rack are both dishwasher safe, making clean-up quick and easy. The stylish matte-black finish is timeless and easy to wipe clean with a damp cloth SAFETY FIRST: With automatic shutoff technology, this air fryer ensures added safety by turning off when cooking is finished or when the basket is removed TRUSTED QUALITY: This air fryer is cETL approved with advanced safety technology for long-lasting durability and comes with a 1-year assurance provided by Chefman. 1700W/120V – RJ38-6T-BLACK

name: Chefman TurboFry® Touch Air Fryer, XL 8-Qt Family Size, One-Touch Digital Control Presets, French Fries, Chicken, Meat, Fish, Nonstick Dishwasher-Safe Parts, Automatic Shutoff, Stainless Steel
short_description: CRISPY & HEALTHY: Dive into the world of our Digital Air Fryer Oven. Relish crispy delights with 98% less oil. Ideal for veggies, pizza, frozen foods, and more. A healthier choice every time. ONE-TOUCH MAGIC: Large Air Fryer Presets for fries, chicken, fish, and meat. Simplify your cooking with this stainless steel air fryer. Start your air frying adventure instantly. LED SHAKE REMINDER: Achieve perfection with our Stainless Steel Air Fryer. The LED alarm ensures even crispiness by reminding you to shake. Every dish, evenly crisped. PRECISE TEMPERATURES: Air Fryer XL Range from 200-400°F caters to every dish. Whether you desire less crunch or more, our air fryer large model has you covered. EFFORTLESS CLEANING: Our Air Fryer 8qt ensures cleaning is a breeze. With a dishwasher-safe basket and tray, and an easy-to-wipe exterior, maintenance is simple and quick. INTELLIGENT SHUTOFF: Prioritizing safety, our Digital Air Fryer pauses heating when opened and resumes when closed. It also shuts off automatically post-cooking. FAMILY-SIZED QUICK COOKING: Designed for 4-6 people, our Large Air Fryer gets dinner ready swiftly. Perfect for those busy evenings when time is of the essence.

name: Fullwill Vision Pro 6QT Air Fryer with Viewing Window,Base and Upper Heating,12 Presets for Chicken Wings,Steak,Fries,Pizza and More,Non-Stick and PFOA-Free,Fast and Oil Free Cooking for Healthy Meals
short_description: No More Flipping: The Fullwill Vision Pro Air Fryer features innovative Base and Upper heating, ensuring even cooking and crispy results every time. Versatile Cooking Presets: With 12 ingredient-specific presets, including chicken wings, steak, fries, and more, preparing your favorite meals has never been easier. Convenient Viewing Window: Monitor your cooking progress effortlessly through the built-in viewing window, allowing you to achieve perfect results without opening the fryer. Healthy Cooking Made Easy: Enjoy your favorite fried foods with up to 85% less oil, making it a healthier choice for you and your family. Spacious 6 QT Capacity: The 6-quart capacity is perfect for family meals, allowing you to cook larger portions while saving time and effort. Easy to Clean: The non-stick basket and crisper plate make cleanup a breeze, so you can spend more time enjoying your meals. User-Friendly Design: The Fullwill Vision Pro Air Fryer combines advanced technology with a sleek design, making it a stylish and functional addition to any kitchen.

name: Ninja Crispi 4-in-1 Portable Glass Air Fryer Cooking System, 1500W, 4QT & 6-Cup TempWare Glass Containers with Storage Lids, Microwave, Freezer & Dishwasher Safe, Cyberspace Gray, FN101GY
short_description: ALL-IN-ONE SYSTEM: Includes the Ninja Crispi PowerPod, 4-qt and 6-cup TempWare glass containers, and 2 storage lids. CRISPI POWERPOD: The power of a full-sized air fryer now in the palm of your hand. SMALL & LARGE BATCH CONTAINERS: 6 cup container cooks a personal sized meal in 7 mins while the 4 QT fits a 4-LB chicken and veggies. THERMAL SHOCK RESISTANT: Borosilicate glassware can go from frozen to crispy in minutes. 4-in-1 FUNCTIONALITY: Max Crisp, Bake, Air Fry, & Recrisp. FIXED HEAT PROTECTION: Permanently fixed heat-safe feet so you can safely set it on granite, laminate, quartz, butcher block, marble, and more. LEAK-PROOF LIDS: Snap-lock lids ensure your meal won’t spill on the go.
product_description: The Ninja Crispi Portable Cooking System packs the 1500W power of a full-sized air fryer into a portable design. It includes a 6-cup and a 4-QT TempWare container. Whether you’re whipping up quick single-serve meals in 7 minutes, sharing crispy snacks on the go, or serving a crowd, the Ninja Crispi makes it easy. With TempWare glassware, you can go right from frozen to crispy in minutes.

product_description: Your health goals do not have to be tabled when you crave the fried foods you love. With the New Gourmia 4 Qt Digital Air Fryer with Guided Cooking kitchen appliances, Black, you and your loved ones can enjoy great food that nourishes your body and tantalizes your tastebuds. This air fryers FryForce 360° Technology fries with air for up to 80% less fat than deep frying. Guided Cooking Prompts offer the option to preheat the small air fryer and enable a Turn Food Reminder, giving you the freedom to use the gourmia airfryer settings needed to get the perfect result every time.
